thread.title: Trump has marching band, Reince Priebus at his Super Bowl Party
thread.title_full: Trump has marching band, Reince Priebus at his Super Bowl Party

author: Greg P.
title: Trump has marching band, Reince Priebus at his Super Bowl Party
text:
Trump has marching band, Reince Priebus at his Super Bowl Party Posted at 7:42   Greg P. 
Some scenes from President Trump’s Super Bowl party at the Trump International Golf Club in West Palm Beach, FL. 
There was a marching band… . @POTUS applauds Palm Beach Central marching band, performing upon his arrival at #SuperBowl watch party at Trump International Golf Club pic.twitter.com/99gWEAJX4e 
— Mike Memoli (@mikememoli) February 5, 2017 POTUS and FLOTUS meet a marching band outside of Trump International Golf Club ahead of the super bowl pic.twitter.com/ZKQ1VB2Xxq 
— Abby D. Phillip (@abbydphillip) February 5, 2017 Trending
